page.title: 03OTHER BOUNDARIES
page.content: Rates are paid to {Winchester City {Council,}water rates to {Southern {WAter}in Worthing, Sussex, but the water supply comes from {Portsmouth {Water Company.} Electricity is supplied by {Southern {Electricity}at Havant, and Gas by { {British Gas} at Southampton. The Postal code starts with {SO3} which includes Warnford in the North, Soberton in the East, Hamble in the South and Hedge End and West End in the West. The Primary School is owned by the{ {Portsmouth Diocese}and administered and financed by {Hampshire County {Council, Mid Hants Area Education {Office.}The Mid Hants area includes Hindhead and Liss in the North, Wickham and Hamble in the South, Sparsholt and Romsey in the West.
